name: Low Power Grid
description:
There's no ingame explaination, might add later. Unfinished.
Currenly 1 level ingame.

Control with the arrow keys/WASD

This is a "real time turn based" game. With grid movement. Every 3rd move causes the player to shoot in the pressed direction. Every 2nd move, the enemy moves. When the power mark lines up ingame on the side, that means in the next "turn" the player shoots, the enemy moves.
